word_mean: 代偿的，补偿的：对缺损和丧失予以弥补的，使丧失的平衡得以恢复的

sentence.Network_en: Money should be spent on compensatory programmes for deprived pre-school and infant-school children.
sentence.Network_cn: 钱应该花在为不能享有学前班和幼儿学校教育的儿童设置的补偿教育项目上。

sentence.Network_en: The jury awarded $11.2 million in compensatory damages.
sentence.Network_cn: 陪审团裁定需要支付1，120万美元以赔偿损失。

sentence.Network_en: He also suggested that this is one of the compensatory mechanisms.
sentence.Network_cn: 他也提出,这是一种补偿的机制.

赔偿-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 赔偿者 compensator 赔偿的 compensatory 损害赔偿金 damage awards.
(六) 补偿性（compensatory）课程：迁就学生学习的劣势，提供相关训练或是替代方案，以弥补身心障碍学生的缺陷，增进其学习与 …

list.abs: ...肥大若因相应器官和组织功能负荷功能过重所致，称为代偿性肥大(compensatory hypertrophy)。如生理状态下.
口译词汇大全 - 英语专业考研论坛 ... 补缺选举 by-election 补偿贸易 compensatory trade 不买帐 not take it;not go for it.
公务员行业术语 ... compensation leave 补假 compensatory leave 补假 competency dimension 才能项目.
补偿教育(compensatory education)系指为文化不利(curtureally disadvantaged)儿童设计不同教育方案,以补偿其幼年缺乏文化刺激的环境,进而减少其课业学习困难和增进课业.

entry.def: Compensatory payments involve money paid as compensation.

example.ex: The jury awarded $11.2 million in compensatory damages.
example.tran: 陪审团裁定需要支付1,120万美元以赔偿损失。

entry.tran: 补偿性质的;弥补性质的
entry.def: Compensatory measures are designed to help people who have special problems or disabilities.

example.ex: Money should be spent on compensatory programmes for deprived pre-school and infant-school children.
example.tran: 钱应该花在为不能享有学前班和幼儿学校教育的儿童设置的补偿教育项目上。
